page: MI62002: Numerical Methods For Subsurface Environment

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Climate simulation; Rock to air heat transfer in underground openings; Ventilation network analysis; Control flow and free splitting networks; Models for controlled recirculation; Diffusion and migration of contaminants in subsurface environment; Fire simulation; Noise in underground environment.
page: MI62002: Numerical Methods For Subsurface Environment
